nodes.text: Ifpe'a was a Chiss Expansionary Defense Force space station in the Unknown Regions. In 21 BBY, Aristocra Sev'eere'nuruodo of the Nuruodo family met Kung'urama'nuruodo, an ambassador of the Galactic Republic. During their meeting, Ifpe'a was attacked by a CIS fleet under the command of overseer Umbrag. While the Aristocra and the ambassador escaped with the Hasty Harpy, the station couldn't resist the incoming fire and was destroyed.
